thread.title: Matt Barnes gets off-court support for beating up Derek Fisher
thread.title_full: Matt Barnes gets off-court support for beating up Derek Fisher | New York Post

author: Danika Fears
title: Matt Barnes gets off-court support for beating up Derek Fisher
text:
NBA bad boy Matt Barnes is getting support off the court after beating up Knicks coach Derek Fisher for dating his ex. 
Former Cleveland Cavaliers guard Daniel “Boobie” Gibson said Friday that he has no problem with what Barnes did because he would have done the same thing.
“You don’t want nobody that’s been around you’’ dating your former girlfriend or wife, Gibson told Power 105.1 radio. “You crossing the line’’ by dating them.
Asked what he would do if he was in a similar situation, he said, “I’m doing it, too,’’ referring to the attack.
On Saturday night, Barnes raced over to the California home of his estranged wife, ex-“Basketball Wives” star Gloria Govan, and attacked Fisher, 41.
The Memphis Grizzlies forward told ESPN on Thursday that he sped to his ex’s home out of concern for his twin boys — not in a fit of jealous rage.
Barnes admitted that the situation “escalated” after he showed up.
